skill.name: Sylvio's Showstopping Performance
skill.description: Can be used when your Life Points decrease by 1500. This Skill can only be used once per Duel. Instead of conducting a Normal Draw, draw an "Abyss Actor" or "Yosenju" monster of your choice. In addition, add a Pendulum Zone to your field if you begin the Duel with a Deck that has 9 or more "Abyss Actor" Pendulum Monsters or "Yosenju" monsters. (Extra Deck does not count.)

skill.name: Phantom Strategy
skill.description: Send 1 "The Phantom Knights" monster from your hand to the Graveyard. Then, add 1 "Phantom Knights' Fog Blade" to the very bottom of your Deck from outside of your Deck. During the turn you activate this Skill, you cannot Special Summon Rank 4 or above monsters unless are DARK Warrior-Type or DARK Dragon-Type monsters This Skill can be used if you begin the Duel with a Deck (excluding Extra Deck) that contains no monsters other than DARK Warrior-Type monsters. This Skill can only be used once per Duel.

skill.name: Smile World
skill.description: Add 1 "Smile World" to your hand from outside of your Deck. If you activate this Skill, you can only activate or use the effect of "Smile" Spell/Trap cards until the end of your opponent's next turn. This Skill can only be used once per Duel.

linkedArticle.title: How to Farm Yuya Sakaki
linkedArticle.description: Everything you need to know about farming Yuya Sakaki. His decklists, card rewards, top level farm decks with strategy information and free to play card replacements. This article will help you farm him as efficiently as possible.

children.content: keys to duel at the gate.
You will see Yuya 's unlock missions upon reaching Stage 9 or above in Duel World (DM)
Unlocking Yuya will also unlock Duel World (ARC-V)
Summon 1 Level (Rank) 7 or higher Dragon-Type monster(s).
